content: this crochet pattern for a self-striping hooded cowl is full of interest with texture color and softness and can be worn as an infinity scarf or as a head wrap elegant enough for evening but comfy and warm enough for every day this hooded cowl is called sweet harmony because of the soothing touch and delightful design of this self-striping yarn you can use your favorite self-striping yarn to make this beauty or go for a more subtle charm with a soft solid it s all up to you ** this is a downloadable crochet pattern - no physical product will be shipped** ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pattern name sweet harmony hooded cowl skill level easy size one size fits most the written pattern uses us terminology and has been fully tested the completed hood and mask should take approximately 2 5-3 5 hours to make please contact me via dm if you have any trouble with the pattern and i will do everything possible to help you create a beautiful finished product share on instagram with hashtag #madewithatwisters and tag @madewithatwist ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ didn t find what you re looking for see all of our designs for hats scarves gloves boot cuffs kids products home decor items and more in our main shop http //ravelry com/stores/made-with-a-twist ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ ✤ thank you so much for visiting my little shop for buying handmade and supporting independent business when buying from a small business each purchase makes a difference in the life of a family -
